name: Zhao Zhang 0008
content: Zhang, Zhao | Electrical and Computer Engineering | University of Illinois Chicago Your browser is unsupported We recommend using the latest version of IE11, Edge, Chrome, Firefox or Safari. Zhao Zhang Associate Professor Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering Contact Building & Room: 1106 SEO Address: 851 S. Morgan St, MC 154, Chicago, IL 60607 Office Phone: 312.996.3420 Email: zhangz@uic.edu About Research Interests Dr. Zhang’s research interests include computer architecture, parallel and distributed systems, and architectural support for system security. He received his BS and MS degrees in Computer Science from Huazhong University of Science of Technology, China, in 1991 and 1994, respectively, and the PhD degree in Computer Science from the College of William and Mary in 2002. He is a member of the IEEE and a senior member of the ACM. Education Ph.D. Computer Science College of William and Mary, 2002 M.Sc. Computer Science Huazhong University of Science and Technology, China,1994 B.Sc. Computer Science Huazhong University of Science and Technology, China,1991
